Name: Pirouette
About the game: Pirouette is a casual arcade figure skating game. Just like any other regular figure skating performance, your show includes explosives, deadly lasers and some sweet sweet heavy metal tunes. Easy to get started - difficult to master. Challenge yourself in 4 different game modes and save your high scores in the leaderboard!
